About Myself

People also know me as ronny.

labor omnia vincit is latin phrase written which means hardwork conquers all which I truly believe and follow in every day to day activities.

This has helped me build my repertoire and progress as Front End Web Developer.

By gaining over + years commercial experience I have always shown to be a enthusiastic Developer with the eagerness to improve my current skillset, as well as going outside my comfort zone and finding solutions for problems rather than waiting around or giving up.

+ years

PayPal interactive table

background:

A slick looking Foundation Grid Framework table which compares service account features available on PayPal. To further improve the website I have developed the website so it is responsive on multiple platforms using @media queries.

technologies used:

Foundation CSS Framework, HTML5, CSS3 and Responsive Web Design

view website

Aquatic Bowl Museum

background:

Vue.JS project used to create animal profiles which can be navigated through based on the Discover Zone allocated in data JSON file. Created accordion, mousehover functionalities on images, Meta data structure for Anlaytics purposes in future and many more using Vue.JS.

technologies used:

Vue.JS, Vue Carousel, Vue Fullpage.js, Vue Match Heights, Vue Meta, Vue Scroll To, Vue Router, Bulma, SASS and Responsive Web Design

view website

Bugatti responsive e-mail newsletter

background:

The webpage has been implemented using the table structure columns. With the use of CSS media screen queries the page has been made responsive.

technologies used:

HTML5, CSS3 and Responsive Web Design
